content: प्रमत्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Intoxicated, drunk; कथां प्रमत्तः प्रथमं कृतामिव (न स्मरिष्यति) <ls>Ś. 4. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Mad, insane. {@--3@} Careless, negligent, inattentive heedless, regardless (generally with <ab>loc.</ab>). {@--4@} Swerving from, failing to do (with <ab>abl.</ab>) {@--5@} Blundering. {@--6@} Wanton, lascivious.
